ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from changing Country between Egypt and Talabat countries , should only be allow to change country when is empty or changing between Talabat countries
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( AND( ISCHANGED(Country__c), INCLUDES(Country__c, 'Egypt'), OR( INCLUDES(PRIORVALUE(Country__c), 'Bahrain'), INCLUDES(PRIORVALUE(Country__c), 'Jordan'), INCLUDES(PRIORVALUE(Country__c), 'Kingdom of Saudi Arabia'), INCLUDES(PRIORVALUE(Country__c), 'Kuwait'), INCLUDES(PRIORVALUE(Country__c), 'Oman'), INCLUDES(PRIORVALUE(Country__c), 'United Arab Emirates'), INCLUDES(PRIORVALUE(Country__c), 'Qatar') ) ), AND( ISCHANGED(Country__c), INCLUDES(PRIORVALUE(Country__c) , 'Egypt') ) ), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Talabat_Inbound_Case", NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) )
